chunk:
Evanhealy Sweet Blossom Body Oil

Brand: evanhealy

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Sunflower (Helianthus annuus) Seed Oil*, Sesame (Sesamum indicum) Seed Oil*, Olive (Olea europaea) Oil*, Jojoba (Simmondsia chinensis) Seed Oil*, Pomegranate (Punica granatum) Seed Oil*, Calendula (Calendula officinalis) Flower Extract*, Sweet O

er Extract*, Sweet Orange (Citrus sinensis) Peel Oil*, Petitgrain Sur Fleurs (Citrus aurantium amara) Leaf/Twig/Flower Oil*, Frankincense (Boswellia carterii) Oil*, Ylang Ylang (Cananga odorata) Flower Oil*. *ORGANIC

Directions: Smooth oil onto skin after bath or shower, Penetrates quickly, leaving skin glowing and feeling soft and silky smooth. F

and silky smooth. For the bath: Pour a bit of oil into water for a fragrant, soothing, and hydrating body treatment.

Warnings: Store away from heat and light. If redness or irritation develops, discontinue use. Avoid contract with eyes. For external use only.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW:
e Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
